game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of strange occurrences. Livestock has gone missing, and the villagers are afraid to venture out after dark.
game.objective: Investigate the strange happenings in Oakwood village and put an end to whatever evil force is causing them.
game.reward: A magical amulet that grants resistance to fear and a small pile of gold coins.

tasks.description: Speak with the villagers and gather information about the missing livestock.
tasks.objective: Gather clues about the disappearance of the livestock.

tasks.description: Investigate the old, abandoned mine on the outskirts of the village. It is said to be haunted by the spirits of former miners.
tasks.location: Old Mine on the outskirts of Oakwood village
tasks.objective: Find evidence of what's causing the strange occurrences in the village.

tasks.description: Confront the source of the evil and put an end to it. This could be a monster, a cult, or something else entirely.
tasks.location: Varies depending on the player's investigation
tasks.objective: Defeat the evil force causing the strange occurrences in Oakwood village.

game.title: The Curse of Oakwood
